hosting_email_detach_option_title: Detach email option from my hosting plan
hosting_email_detach_option_description: The {{ emailOption }} solution has been chosen to replace the email solution attached to your {{hosting}} hosting plan. By detaching the option, you can renew it separately from your hosting plan. However, the option will be billed at the standard price for email options.
hosting_email_detach_option_warning_irre: Warning: this action cannot be undone
hosting_email_detach_option_error: An error has occurred detaching the option: {{error}}
hosting_email_detach_option_success_with: The email option detachment has been processed. Your account {{accountId}} has been debited from {{price}}. See my invoice
Your purchase order has been successfully generated. The email option detachment will be effective after it has been paid for.
